akn:content.akn:p: (a) Repeal of statutory authorities The following laws, and portions of laws, are hereby repealed:

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Force and effect of contracts and cooperative and other agreements under cooperative forestry programs executed under authority of repealed statutes

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Force and effect of contracts and cooperative and other agreements under cooperative forestry programs executed under authority of repealed statutes Contracts and cooperative and other agreements under cooperative forestry programs executed under authority of the Acts, or portions thereof, repealed under subsection (a) of this section shall remain in effect until revoked or amended by their own terms or under other provisions of law.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Availability of funds appropriated under authority of repealed statutes for cooperative forestry assistance programs

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Availability of funds appropriated under authority of repealed statutes for cooperative forestry assistance programs Funds appropriated under the authority of the Acts, or portions thereof, repealed under subsection (a) of this section shall be available for expenditure for the programs authorized under this chapter.
